Class VideoMonitorImpl

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.BaseObjectImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.ControllerIoImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.DeviceImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.VideoMonitorImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SonarObject, ControllerIO, Device, Storable, VideoMonitor
public class VideoMonitorImpl extends DeviceImpl implements VideoMonitor
A video monitor device.
Author:
Douglas Lau

      public static void setCamMirrored(int mn, CameraImpl c, String src)
      Set camera on all video monitors with a given number.
      Parameters:
      mn - Monitor number.
      c - Camera to display.
      src - Source of command.
